column2: "My oh my, a fresh face seems to have joined our ranks. A shame they didn't possess the decency to introduce themself."
"...I knew I recognized that crawling feeling down my back. So you really are here, [Loser]. I suppose the other is [Elder], then?"
"Indeed, we are a gathering of repugnance. It exceeds common sense. Just what manner of vessel is this?"
"...Dear me, was that untoward? I meant no disrespect to our gracious host."
"In any event, I see you're as slovenly as ever."
"I don't want to hear that from you, you freeloading leech."
"I thought you held no interest in a world devoid of the Akashic Record."
"...That's right. Xion is no longer of this world. Thus, the world has lost the Akashic Record."
"My reason for being here in spite of that... Well, is the answer not trivial?"
"...You're not planning on using <%me>, are you?"
"Suspicious, are we? Could it be you feel you owe a debt of gratitude toward the one who saved your past self?"
"O-Of course I don't. I'm merely saying that the idea of keeping company with those whose motives are unclear does not appeal to me!"
"Hah. You may lay your fears to rest. I provide my power, and am reimbursed with knowledge. That is the extent of our deal."
"...Hey, <%me>. That might be his story now, but don't you think it would be better to kick him out?"
"I'll consider it."
"If only I could."
"Please cease your grievances. I am doing no harm by simply existing here."
"It's just as you said, [Apprentice]. I am but a mere freeloading leech."
"A future not even Xion could foresee. We will be the witnesses to it!"
"Hahah! Rather desperate, aren't you [Loser]? This performance of yours fits your filthy name down to the letter."
"I cannot help but express what is ingrained within my very being. Are you not the same, [Apprentice]?"
"Why not just admit that you've taken a liking to <%me>?"
"T-That's absurd! I'm only here out of necessity! Because I have to be!"
"And I am no longer [Apprentice]! My name is Margareta! You would do well to remember that, [Loser]!"
"Goodness. She appears to be a bit more green around the ears than the [Apprentice] I know."
"Though I supposed that has its benefits. It makes her all the more malleable..."
"If you don't knock it off..."
"...I'm evicting you"
"You wound me. Worry not, I wouldn't dare go against the will of our host. You can be sure I'll play nice with our newest tenant."
"[Apprentice]"
